name: Costa Bouras
story: Growing up in a small village in Greece, Costa was always fascinated with guns and wanted to join the military since he was young. He joined the Hellenic Army where he served for a few years until he found his way into the ranks of the Independent forces in Altis. Costa is known for being a reliable, but introverted soldier who doesn't talk much unless necessary. He enjoys fishing in his free time and misses Greece dearly.
